official-title.#text:
Expressing support for the 2013 Boy Scouts
		  of America National Scout Jamboree in West Virginia.

cosponsor.#tail:
) submitted the
			 following resolution; which was referred to the

text.#text: That the

honors each scout,
			 venturer, volunteer, and staff member from across the United States celebrating
			 the 2013 National Scout Jamboree in West Virginia; and

to prepare a copy of this resolution for presentation to the
			 National Council of the Boy Scouts of America and the State of West Virginia as
			 an expression of the gratitude of the Congress of the United States—

Clerk of the House of
			 Representatives

text.#text: directs the

to scouting;
			 and

for choosing West
			 Virginia as the site of the permanent home for the National Scout
			 Jamboree.

Whereas the Boy Scouts of America is composed of 2.6
			 million youth members between the ages of 7 and 21 and more than 1 million
			 volunteers in local councils throughout the United States and its
			 territories;

quote.#text: To help other people at all times.

text.#text:
Whereas, since the first Jamboree in 1937, hundreds of
			 thousands of scouts have gathered at the National Scout Jamboree to live out
			 the scout oath,

quote.#tail: ) in West Virginia marks the 17th National Scout Jamboree;

text.#text:
Whereas the 2013 Jamboree located at the world-class
			 Summit Bechtel Family National Scout Reserve (commonly referred to as the

Whereas the 2019 World Scout Jamboree will be conducted in
			 the United States for the first time in 52 years;

Whereas the Summit is the new home of achievement,
			 adventure, and innovation in scouting;
Whereas the theme of the 2013 Jamboree is

Whereas each year the scouts volunteer over 10 million
			 hours of service in their local communities;

Whereas the National Jamboree is a chance to camp out with
			 friends, meet new friends, try high-adventure activities, learn new skills,
			 enjoy the outdoors, and have fun in an atmosphere of scouting fellowship;
			 and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
is committed to the time-honored
			 celebration of the National Scout Jamboree and the goals and values of the Boy
			 Scouts of America: Now, therefore, be it

text.#text: Whereas
